summary: A group of washed-up Canadian punk rockers get back together for a road trip in memory of a dear friend who was supposedly shot, or so rumors imply. As they travel, they ignore the underlying psychological darkness within each other.
cast: Hugh Dillon|Callum Keith Rennie|John Pyper-Ferguson|Bernie Coulson|Julian Richings|Benita Ha|Claudia Ferri|Joey Ramone|Corrine Koslo|Bruce McDonald|Danny Nowak|Jochen A. Schliessler|Jeremy Bishop|Tony Tucker|Art Bergmann|Flash Bastard|Lick The Pole|Modernettes|D.O.A.|Dan Fazzio|Pete Mills|Terry David Mulligan|Nicole Parker|Megan Leitch|Michael Kopsa|Alexa Mardon|Xantha Radley|Jennifer Bishop|Samaya Jardey|Morgan Brayton|Dean Paraskevopoulos|Daniel Salerno|Sarah Hickinbottom|Adam Bullied|Debbie Jow|Catya Gardner|Sarah Richards|Natasha Duprey|Joe Keithley|Molly Parker|Rich Priske|Trevor Roberts
title: Hard Core Logo
